lines.text:
[Accidentally hits Moe with an ax]
I'm sorry Moe I didn't know you were standing there.
Oh that's alright kid accidents can happen to the best of families.

[Moe grabs Larry's head with ice tongs]
Oh Moe ow ow!

[singing]
We baked you a birthday cake...
If you get a tummy ache...
And you moan and groan and woe...
Don't forget we told you so! Happy birthday!

[wakes up with his head stuck in a block of ice]
Moe! Defrost me!

[runs up a long flight of stairs with a giant ice block]
Where should I put it?

[the ice block has melted into a tiny cube]
Well you can put that one in your pocket.
Whoa! Hey Moe, look!
30, and will be done by 8 o' clooock.
[turkey sprays him]

[hands Curly a block of ice]
Here.

[hands Curly another block of ice]
Here!
Here?
No, up there!
Nyaaaah!
Make a wish dear and blow out the candles.
Alright here they go.

[Cake explodes ]
Now I remember the ice men!
